name: New
description: The ticket is new and waiting the system automatic assigned to support users.

name: Waiting for Support
description: The ticket is waiting for a response from a support team member.

name: Waiting for Customer
description: The ticket requires additional information or input from the reporter. This may mean that the ticket is blocked until the additional information is provided.

name: In Progress
description: The ticket has been assigned and is being investigated.

name: Canceled
description: The ticket is no longer required and the reporter has selected “Cancel Request”. This status is solely for the reporter to use.

name: Resolved
description: The reported issue has been resolved and tested by the support team or your query has been answered in full.

name: Closed
description: The ticket has been resolved or canceled and no further activity is expected.
